issue.description: This attribute can't be redeclared from SELF\Shape_element.containing_shape as some options in extensible select are not compatible with original type of SELF\Shape_element.containing_shape attribute - Item_shape. Need to make this attribute simple and not redecalred. Also SELF\Shape_element.containing_shape needs to be somehow forbidden to be set as it is overlapping with scope. The only item which is not subtype of item_shape is Stratum (added in layered_interconnect_module_design). So maybe just remove it?

comment.description: believe this is an epm bug.
